name: Michael Shafrir
body: Hey, I'm [Michael Shafrir](/). I work on [Mobile](https://twitter.com/twittermobile) at [Twitter](https://twitter.com). Previously, I worked on [MarketBrief](http://marketbrief.com), a financial technology startup in Palo Alto, CA that was part of the YC S11 batch.
